snippet: China wants to use Shanghai as a platform for financial overhauls, including interest rate liberalization and full convertibility of China’s currency.
abstract: China says it will establish pilot free trade zone in Shanghai to test some financial overhauls, including interest rate liberalization and full currency convertibility; analysts say move will also allow 'financial product innovation,' and raising of money abroad or investment in foreign stocks by corporations.
lead_paragraph: China wants to use Shanghai as a platform for financial overhauls, including interest rate liberalization and full convertibility of China’s currency.

headline.main: China to Test Free Trade Zone in Shanghai as Part of Economic Overhaul
headline.print_headline: China to Test Free Trade Zone in Shanghai as Part of Economic Overhaul
